channel.title: Feminism Internet on JSONBecker
channel.description: Recent content in Feminism Internet on JSONBecker

item.title: Growing Up in the Internet Hate Machine
item.description: A terrible thing is happening this year. Women all across the internet are finding themselves the target of violence, simply for existing. Women are being harassed for talking about video games, women are being harassed for talking about the technology industry, women are being harassed for talking, women are being harassed. A terrible thing is happening. Women are finding themselves the target of violence. A terrible thing has always happened.
